casebody.data:
LAWRENCE WILMER KIRBY v. ELIZABETH ELAM KIRBY 18 So. (2nd) 754

June Term, 1944

July 11, 1944 Division A Martin J. Pearl, for appellant. Alton T. Peacock, for appellee. *702PER CURIAM:

This is a suit for divorce on the ground of habitual intemperance. Appellant • contends that the statutory residence nor the ground relied on for divorce was proven. We have examined the record and find evidence sufficient to support both.

Affirmed.

BUFORD, C. J., TERRELL, CHAPMAN and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
